product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Brila Mini Lantern
long_description: Shed some light on your camp after the sun sets. The Brila Mini Lantern from Ultimate Survival Technologies offers up to 14 hours of bright LED light in a small, sturdy, camp-friendly design. 2 AA batteries (sold separately) provide up to 14 hours of use on low, 5 on high and 48 hours on flash setting. 2 LED bulbs output up to 27 lumens on high setting, 13.5 lumens on low. White bulb for bright light; red bulb for alert or S.O.S signaling; 360deg light distribution provides more usuable light than other LED lanterns of similar size. Built-in recessed carabiner in the lantern base lets you hang it upside down for hands-free use; embedded magnet provides another means of placement. Ultimate Surival Technologies Brila Mini Lantern is water-resistant and features an ABS-plastic housing with rubberized zones to endure impacts. Lantern measure 4.5 x 1.75 x 1.75 in.
short_description: Shed some light on your camp after the sun sets. The Brila Mini Lantern from Ultimate Survival Technologies offers up to 14 hours of bright LED light in a small, sturdy, camp-friendly design.
